overview: Captain Zion Nicholas and his officers are sworn to protect the citizenry and uphold the law but it's kind of a quiet town and they do what they can to fill the idle hours. Married life keeps Jake Porter from exploring his gay fantasies as much as he'd like, but one look at handy man Leeroy Jones has Jake bulging in his pants, and he throws caution to the wind to indulge in a deep desire. Michael Jackman evaluates David Skylar's sex feats and it starts on a very bad note. David shows how he usually acts and Michael is overwhelmed by how much needs to be improved. While fixing the quad in the garage, Justin Matthews suddenly finds himself trapped below. Fortunately, Johnny B came to see him, but that still doesn't solve the problem with Justin being released.
title: Sex Instructor
